nodes.text: The Ways and Means Committee room was a room on the planet Cularin that was used by the Cularin Government during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Circa 21 BBY, Senator Lavina Wren, Jedi Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk and Major Xirossk attended a meeting in the Committee room, to discuss the implications of some data that had been recovered from the Believer Gura Tran during a mission in the Ando system.
